scripts.watch: npm run prewatch & cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config ./build/webpack.config.js --watch --progress
scripts.watchPreview: npm run prewatch & cross-env NODE_ENV=development API_ENV=release  webpack --config ./build/webpack.config.js --watch --progress
scripts.watchPro: npm run prewatch & cross-env NODE_ENV=development API_ENV=production  webpack --config ./build/webpack.config.js --watch --progress
scripts.buildTest: npm run prewatch & cross-env API_ENV=test NODE_ENV=production webpack  --config ./build/webpack.config.js --progress
scripts.buildPreview: npm run prewatch & cross-env API_ENV=release NODE_ENV=production webpack  --config ./build/webpack.config.js --progress
scripts.buildPro: npm run prewatch & cross-env API_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production webpack  --config ./build/webpack.config.js --progress
scripts.production: npm run prewatch & cross-env API_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production webpack  --config ./build/webpack.config.js --progress
